rules.ruleString: Must be enrolled in course type {10, 41, 50}
Unit was previously coded {GSM3420, MGC3420%, MGC3424}
Must have passed 1 (I/W) units in {MGF2661} with grades other than {STANDARD-DEF, STANDARD-NS}

description: This unit examines the strategic roles of human resource development in organisations: training; management and career development; and organisational development. Theories and factors affecting training outcomes; and economic, ethical, legal and financial considerations are considered also.
